TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit QueryableFilterUserControl extends System.Web.UI.UserControl
Public MustInherit Class QueryableFilterUserControl Inherits UserControl
public ref class QueryableFilterUserControl abstract : System::Web::UI::UserControl

summary.span: Fornece uma classe base para controles de filtro.

span.span: Provides a base class for filter controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O é a classe base para controles de usuário que renderizam filtros que podem ser conectados aos dados dinâmicos de filtragem do framework que se baseia o classe.The class is the base class for user controls that render filters that can be plugged into the Dynamic Data filtering framework that is based on the class. Os implementadores devem substituir os controle, que pode retornar um modificado objeto que reflete o estado do filtro.Implementers must override the control, which can return a modified object that reflects the filter's state. A classe base contém métodos auxiliares para a criação de árvores de expressão do LINQ.The base class contains helper methods for building LINQ expression trees. ## Examples Um projeto do Visual Studio com o código-fonte está disponível para acompanhar este tópico: [dados dinâmicos de Scaffolding](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=168914).A Visual Studio project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Scaffolding Dynamic Data](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=168914).

remarks.format: ## Remarks Por padrão, os dados dinâmicos fornece booliano, chave estrangeira e modelos de filtro de enumeração.By default, Dynamic Data provides Boolean, foreign-key, and enumeration filter templates.

summary.span: Obtém o controle de dados que trata o filtro dentro do modelo de filtro.

span.span: Gets the data control that handles the filter inside the filter template.

value.span: O controle de dados que trata o filtro.

span.span: The data control that handles the filter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Esta propriedade é `null` se o modelo de filtro não substituí-la.This property is `null` if the filter template does not override it.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Linq.IQueryable GetQueryable(class System.Linq.IQueryable source) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function GetQueryable (source As IQueryable) As IQueryable

span.span: The source object.

summary.span: Obtém o objeto transformado do objeto de origem.

span.span: Gets the transformed object from the source object.

returns.span: O objeto transformado do objeto de origem.

span.span: The transformed object from the source object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Você deve implementar esse método se você derivar um controle .You must implement this method if you derive a control from . ## Examples Esse método é implementado para transformar o código-fonte objeto no destino objeto.This method is implemented to transform the source object into the target object. Exemplos de expressões que você talvez queira implementar incluem order by, intervalo ou de pesquisa.Examples of expressions that you might want to implement include order by, range, or search. O exemplo a seguir mostra como implementar o método para um filtro booliano que é derivado de .The following example shows how to implement the method for a Boolean filter that is derived from . ```csharp public override IQueryable GetQueryable(IQueryable source) { if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(DropDownList1.SelectedValue)) { return source; } bool value = Convert.ToBoolean(DropDownList1.SelectedValue); ParameterExpression parameterExpression = Expression.Parameter(source.ElementType, "item"); Expression body = BuildQueryBody( parameterExpression, value); LambdaExpression lambda = Expression.Lambda(body, parameterExpression); MethodCallExpression whereCall = Expression.Call( typeof(Queryable), "Where", new Type[] { source.ElementType }, source.Expression, Expression.Quote(lambda)); return source.Provider.CreateQuery(whereCall); } ``` ```vb Public Overloads Overrides Function GetQueryable(ByVal source As IQueryable) As IQueryable If [String].IsNullOrEmpty(DropDownList1.SelectedValue) Then Return source End If Dim value As Boolean = Convert.ToBoolean(DropDownList1.SelectedValue) Dim parameterExpression As ParameterExpression = Expression.Parameter(source.ElementType, "item") Dim body As Expression = BuildQueryBody(parameterExpression, value) Dim lambda As LambdaExpression = Expression.Lambda(body, parameterExpression) Dim whereCall As MethodCallExpression = Expression.[Call](GetType(Queryable), "Where", _ New Type() {source.ElementType}, source.Expression, Expression.Quote(lambda)) Return source.Provider.CreateQuery(whereCall) End Function ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void OnFilterChanged() cil managed

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Chame esse método quando a seleção de filtro é alterado para notificar a fonte de dados que a consulta deve ser executada novamente.Call this method when the filter selection has changed in order to notify the data source that the query must be re-run.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void PopulateListControl(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl listControl) cil managed

span.span: A list control.

summary.span: Popula um controle de lista com todos os elementos de chave estrangeira ou elementos boolianos na tabela.

span.span: Populates a list control with all the foreign-key elements or Boolean elements in the table.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Colunas de chave estrangeira são preenchidas com elementos da tabela de chave estrangeira.Foreign-key columns are populated with elements from the foreign-key table. Colunas Boolianas são preenchidas com "All", "True" e "False".Boolean columns are populated with "All", "True", and "False".
